name: SutraReader
short_description: This is an application designed to arrange / lay out a Chinese or Japanese Sutra text in the traditional layout (from top to bottom, from right to left). The input can be any file (the application can pick out the relevant parts) and the output is the layout (arranged in HTML file(s)) and the content (a plain text file with the content). Beside this, you can get a statistics about the ideograms and can exclude certain characters or ideograms from the content.
summary: Arranges a Sutra text in the traditional layout
